trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for working with specific tables as a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link> instance.
trans-unit.target: Provides functionality for working with specific tables as a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link> instance.

trans-unit.source: This object contains the following members:
trans-unit.target: This object contains the following members:

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified <parameterReference>tableName</parameterReference> as a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link>.
trans-unit.target: Returns the specified <parameterReference>tableName</parameterReference> as a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current table as a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link>.
trans-unit.target: Returns the current table as a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link>.

trans-unit.source: Call the <languageKeyword>getTable</languageKeyword> method on the global <languageKeyword>tables</languageKeyword> object to get a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link> that represents a specific <parameterReference>tableName</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: Call the <languageKeyword>getTable</languageKeyword> method on the global <languageKeyword>tables</languageKeyword> object to get a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link> that represents a specific <parameterReference>tableName</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>current</languageKeyword> property on the global <languageKeyword>tables</languageKeyword> object gets a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link> that represents the current table.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>current</languageKeyword> property on the global <languageKeyword>tables</languageKeyword> object gets a <link xlink:href="57bc4156-b9f1-488d-b89c-a9072b221bd6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table object</link> that represents the current table.

trans-unit.source: The following script calls the <languageKeyword>getTable</languageKeyword> method to get the <codeInline>permissions</codeInline> table against which to execute queries.
trans-unit.target: The following script calls the <languageKeyword>getTable</languageKeyword> method to get the <codeInline>permissions</codeInline> table against which to execute queries.

trans-unit.source: The following script shows usage of the <languageKeyword>current</languageKeyword> property in validation logic.
trans-unit.target: The following script shows usage of the <languageKeyword>current</languageKeyword> property in validation logic.
